text: The Sikorsky VH-60N White Hawk is a special variant of the Sikorsky UH-60 Blackhawk used for transport of the President of the United States as Marine One. It entered service in the year 1988 and it is still in operation today. The White Hawk is typically used for short trips by the president, and also for transportation of presidential staff and artifacts. Category:Helicopters Category:United States Marine Corps aircraft VH-60N
title: Sikorsky VH-60N White Hawk
